programme.title: Striking Rescue
programme.desc: They killed his wife. They killed his daughter. Now, Muay Thai expert Bai An (Tony Jaa) is coming for them.

programme.title: Fearless Kung Fu King
programme.desc: In order to establish himself in Jinmen, Huo Yuanjia challenges seven Kung Fu schools.

programme.title: Code Of The Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin's debut mission entangles him in a plot, fleeing both government and rival assassins.

programme.title: Furie
programme.desc: When traffickers kidnap her daughter, Hai Phuong returns to Saigon to take down the abductors.

programme.desc: Aided by a lawman and a warrior, villagers unite to fight a strongman during China's Warlord Era.

programme.title: Shadow
programme.desc: To finally achieve victory over a rival kingdom, a brilliant general devises an intricate plan.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A reformed legendary gangster must become the brutal criminal he left behind to rescue his wife.

programme.desc: To catch the world's most wanted, an agent assembles a team of hackers to plan the ultimate heist.
